54 template <typename CommandType>
55 class PlannerForCommandType : public Planner {
56 public:
57  PlannerForCommandType(const std::string& name) : Planner(name){};
58  ~PlannerForCommandType() override = default;

60  PlannerForCommandType(const PlannerForCommandType& other) = default;

62  default;

65  default;

67  [[nodiscard]] bool is_applicable(
68  const MotionCommand& command) const override {
69  return std::holds_alternative<CommandType>(command);
